history.text: have you seen The Wolf of Wall Street?
I have not. Is it a good movie?
its pretty good. Its directed by Martin Scorsese, and is about the excesses of a real life person named jordan belfort while working on wall street
What do you mean when you say excesses? Does he spend too much money?
money, drugs, sex and other crazy things while working as a stock broker. Jordan Belfort is played by Leonardo DiCaprio
Wow! That's quite a crazy life style for a stock broker. Not what you'd expect.
Leonardo DiCaprio you say? He's one of my favorite actors!
Are there any other notable actors in the movie?
Johah Hill plays his business partner in the movie and has a bunch of great scenes and lines too
Ah, I don't know much about him. What kind of reviews did The Wolf of Wall Street get?
It was well reviewed, but the ratings given by rotten tomatoes and metacritic are 78% and 75/100 respectively.
That's not too bad. Can you tell me more about Jordan Belfort's lifestyle? Does it crash down on him?
the movie starts off in the late 80s where Jordan works for a firm named LF Rothschild, where he works for Mark Hana who shows him the sex and drugs lifestyle of being a stock broker.
Right, but surely that lifestyle isn't sustainable. Does he ever face any consequences?

yes, eventually the FBI comes after him. Once he loses his job with Rothschild and goes to work for a penny stock broker, the movie really takes off, as Jordan makes a fortune which sets up the rest of the movie
Sounds like he gets what's coming to him. This movie does sound quite interesting. When was it released?
it came out in 2013. its totally worth seeing. you should check it out.
I think I'd really enjoy seeing part of the 1% fall from grace.
What have critics said about the movie?

it gets crazy. After the penny brokerage, Jordan founds his own company with his with his neighbor and friends and they engineer a bunch of pump and dump scams. Critics were somewhat mixed saying that its interesting but also a possible "glorification" of the activity.
It's understandable that critics would have mixed feelings about such a thing. Jordan Belfort sounds like a very immoral person.
Does Jordan have any love interests in the movie?
he does. he has a trophy wife in the film played by Margot Robbie
Figures that the immoral people get the trophy wives. What a crazy world!
he ends up using her inlaws to smuggle cash into switzerland
That poor woman. Did she end up getting arrested as a result?
Jordan eventually gets arrested, and Naomi (his wife) ends up divorcing him
Thank goodness. How many years does he get in prison?
He ends up working with the feds for a reduced sentence and does 3 years in prison
but it doesn't end there
Oh wow! There's more to it?
Thank you for letting me know! I'll look into the movie more on my own!
He goes on to make a living hosting sales seminars

uid1response.feedback: It seemed as though my partner was copying and pasting information, and he was very slow to respond to messages.
